participant_1.name: Samantha
participant_1.personality: Compassionate and hardworking, Samantha is dedicated to making a positive impact in her community.
participant_1.background: I volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. I work fulltime in a shipyard. My favorite color is navy blue. I donate a part of my salary to charity each month.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Energetic and nostalgic, Jordan enjoys creativity and has a passion for dance and music from his youth.
participant_2.background: My favorite toy as a child was my Lite Brite. I take dance lessons once a week. I also like old school hip hop. I was born in the early 80s. I love New Kids on the Block.

content.text: I am great, how are you?
I like to volunteer at the shelter
I do like music. I like music.
